dashboard.description: A quickstart to setup the Prometheus Go runtime exporter with preconfigured dashboards, alerting rules, and recording rules.

options.content: Go metric information can be found at: https://pkg.go.dev/runtime#MemStats

panels.description: Derivative shows rate of change - helpful to highlight movement in metrics which don't appear to change much.
panels.title: Open FDs (derivative)

panels.description: Derivative shows rate of change - helpful to highlight movement in metrics which don't appear to change much.
panels.title: Process Memory (derivative)

panels.description:
Average total bytes of memory reserved across all process instances of a job.
sys_bytes is the total bytes of memory obtained from the OS. Sys measures the virtual address space reserved by the Go runtime for the heap, stacks, and other internal data structures. It's likely that not all of the virtual address space is backed by physical memory at any given moment, though in general it all was at some point.
panels.title: Total Reserved Memory

panels.description:
Average stack memory usage across all instances of a job.
StackSys is bytes of stack memory obtained from the OS. StackSys is StackInuse, plus any memory obtained directly from the OS for OS thread stacks.
panels.title: Stack Memory Use

panels.description: Average memory reservations by the runtime, not for stack or heap, across all instances of a job.
panels.title: Other Memory Reservations (Off Heap)

panels.description: Average memory reserved, and actually in use, by the heap, across all instances of a job.
panels.title: Heap Memory

panels.description: Average allocation rate in bytes per second, across all instances of a job.
panels.title: Allocation Rate, Bytes

panels.description: Average rate of heap object allocation, across all instances of a job.
panels.title: Heap Object Allocation Rate

panels.description: Average number of live memory objects across all instances of a job.
panels.title: Number of Live Objects

panels.description: Average number of goroutines across instances of a job.
panels.title: Goroutines & Go Threads

panels.description: Min and max of the pause duration of garbage collection cycles.
panels.title: GC min & max duration

panels.description: The number used bytes at which the runtime plans to perform the next GC, averaged across all instances of a job.
panels.title: Next GC, Bytes

panels.description: Min and max of the pause duration of garbage collection cycles.
panels.title: GC Last Collection

panels.description: go_memstats_lookups_total – counts how many pointer dereferences happened. This is a counter value so you can use rate() to lookups/s.
panels.title: Rate of a Pointer Dereferences

dashboard.title: Go Exporter Metrics (14061)
